title: What to know about Lamine Yamal net worth , Barcelona salary
body_text:
What to know about Lamine Yamal's net worth, Barcelona salary, and brand partnerships
Lamine Yamal's net worth is estimated to be between $5 million and $8 million. He is a renowned footballer for La Liga club Barcelona and the Spain national team. Lamine has amassed his substantial net worth through his salary at Barcelona and brand partnerships with Adidas and OPPO, among others.
TABLE OF CONTENTS
Key takeaways
- Lamine Yamal's net worth is estimated to be between $5 million and $8 million, thanks to his successful career as a professional football player.
- Lamine signed his first long-term contract with Barcelona, tying him to the football club until June 30, 2021, valued at $45.3 million gross per year.
- For the 2024/2025 season, which extended to June 2026, Yamal was under contract with Barcelona, earning approximately $1.8 million per year.
Lamine Yamal's profile summary
Lamine Yamal's net worth and salary
Is Lamine Yamal a billionaire? He is not yet a billionaire. According to Celebrity Net Worth and The Times of India, his net worth is estimated to be between $5 million and $8 million. He makes his money from his successful career as a professional football player.
So, how much does Lamine Yamal earn? The player's annual net salary is $45.3 million, which includes bonuses and a signing-on fee. His base salary is estimated at $34 million, which translates to $325,000 per week after tax. Previously, his annual salary was approximately $1.8 million, following the signing of a contract extension dated until June 2025.
Lamine Yamal's club career
Lamine is one of the most talented Spanish football players. He was scouted by Barcelona at the age of six and invited to training at La Masia. Consequently, he signed with the club in 2014 and relocated to Barcelona to live and train at the youth academy.
He made his first-team debut for Barcelona in the spring of 2023. A month later, he bagged his La Liga title with Barcelona. Lamine had his first start for the club in August of the same year. At the beginning of 2024, he scored a 2-0 victory in the Supercopa de España semifinal, making him the youngest player to score in the Supercopa.
Over the years, Lamine has set numerous records, including:
- The youngest player to represent and score for the country at age 16
- The youngest player to appear in a UEFA European Championship final (at age 17)
- The youngest player in a European Championship (at age 16)
- The youngest goalscorer in a European Championship (at age 16)
Lamine Yamal's international career
Lamine has been an international player since his youthful days. He began the journey with Catalonia youth teams, captaining the U-12, U-14, and U-16 squads. Later, he represented Spain at various youth levels, including U-15, U-16, U-17, and U-19 squads.
He also took part in the UEFA Euro 2024 qualifiers, scoring in the 74th minute and becoming the youngest goalscorer in the Spanish national team's history. The following year, he was named to Spain's 26-man squad for the Euro 2024. Lamine scored two goals in the 2025 UEFA National League Finals.
Brand partnerships and endorsement deals
While Lamine Yamal's monthly salary is not as high as that of other players, he has amassed a substantial net worth through endorsement deals and brand partnerships. For instance, in early 2024, he signed a long-term partnership with Adidas following his transition from Nike.
How much does Adidas pay Lamine Yamal? His 10-year contract with the footwear company is valued at around $34 million. The deal includes wearing their X Crazyfast boots and endorsing Spark Gen10s, Messi's exclusive signature line.
In 2025, Lamine was appointed as the global brand ambassador for OPPO, becoming the centrepiece for their "Make Your Moment" campaign. In March of the same year, the football player was named the brand ambassador for eFootball, Konami's football video game.
Lamine Yamal's properties
Where does Lamine Yamal live? The football player resides in Barcelona, Spain, but has not provided details about the properties he owns. However, at 16, he had already bought three homes for his family.
He bought one for his grandmother near his original residence in the Rocafonda area of Mataro, a town in Catalonia. He purchased another one near Catalonia for his mum and another in Barcelona for his dad.
FAQs
With many people curious about Lamine Yamal's net worth, Barcelona salary, and brand partnerships, here are some key facts you should know.
Who is Lamine Yamal?
He is a popular Spanish football player, born on July 13, 2007, in Esplugues de Llobregat, Spain, to his mother, Sheila Ebana, a waitress, and his father, Mounir Nasraoui, a building painter. He has two siblings: a younger sister, Barbara, and a younger half-brother, Kane.
Lamine plays as a winger for La Liga club Barcelona and the Spain national football team. As an international player, he has bagged many awards, including being:
- The youngest player to appear in a UEFA European Championship final (at age 17)
- The youngest player in a European Championship (at age 16)
- The youngest goalscorer in a European Championship (at age 16)
Who is the highest-paid player in Barcelona now?
Robert Lewandowski is the highest-paid player at Barcelona, with an annual base salary of approximately $24 million. Frenkie de Jong closely follows him at $22 million. Lamine Yamal takes 3rd place with a yearly salary of $19 million, as per a contract valid until 2031.
What is Lamine Yamal's contract worth?
The professional player's contract is worth around $45.3 million. His base salary is valued at around $34 million, but increases upon the inclusion of bonuses and a signing-on fee. Lamine has a $1 billion release fee, among the highest in the world.
Final word
Lamine Yamal's net worth is estimated to be between $5 million and $8 million. In May 2025, he agreed to sign his long-term contract with Barcelona, which he finalised on July 16, 2025, after his 18th birthday. The contract is worth approximately $45.3 million per year, gross, inclusive of bonuses, wages, and the contract fee. His new contract places him among the highest-earning Barcelona players.
Are you looking for more information about Tate McRae’s net worth? Tuko.co.ke shared an informative article revealing his worth, surprising income sources and brand deals.
Tate McRae's net worth is estimated at $4 million. The Canadian native earns through her successful music career and endorsements from top brands, including Adidas, Essentia Water, and others.
Source: TUKO.co.ke
